text: Sławomir Kohut (born 18 September 1977 in Cieszyn) is a Polish former professional cyclist. ==Major results== ;2000 : 3rd Overall Tour of Bulgaria ;2001 : 2nd Time trial, National Road Championships : 3rd Firenze–Pistoia ;2002 : 3rd Overall Course de la Solidarité Olympique ;2003 : 2nd Overall Course de la Solidarité Olympique : 3rd Time trial, National Road Championships ;2004 : 1st 20px Time trial, National Road Championships : 1st Overall Bałtyk-Karkonosze Tour ::1st Stage 5 : 1st Stage 4 Settimana Ciclistica Lombarda : 2nd Overall Peace Race ::1st Stage 6 : 2nd Overall Course de la Solidarité Olympique : 2nd Tartu GP ;2008 : 2nd Overall Tour du Maroc ==References== ==External links== * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male cyclists Category:Cyclists at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic cyclists of Poland Category:People from Cieszyn Category:Sportspeople from Silesian Voivodeship
title: Sławomir Kohut
